EmailTemplate.description: SSSW - Used to notify the Customer when the Case has been created for transfer to po on automatic network assignment
EmailTemplate.name: SSSW New Case Notification for transfer to po
EmailTemplate.subject: Australia Post - Case: {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Help & Support
Reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for your transfer request, here's your reference number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Your item will now be sent to your preferred Post Office.
We'll let you know when your item is ready to collect. To stay updated on the transfer, simply [track your item](<https://auspost.com.au/mypost/track/#/search>).
Kind regards, Australia Post {!Case.Thread_Id}
